page.title: 14SAVERNAKE HOSPITAL AT WORK
page.content: At{Savernake Hospital}there are 6 {doctors}who spend 2 hours out of their 11 hour day at the hospital.The doctors deal with all illnesses but have their own special subject.The {nurses}have different uniforms.A sister wears a royal blue dress,a frilly cap,black stockings and black shoes.Her uniform has lots of pockets. Each nurse has 7 uniforms. An important department in the hospital is the{casualty department. There they see between 14 and 25 people a day and well over 4000 each year.In the department they have an X- ray room and 1 portable X-ray.They also have a fridge to keep the blood cool.The{kitchens}are also very important.They are allowed to spend Â£1.22 per patient a day.Patients have 4 meals a day of healthy food,with snacks in between if they want them.
